name: A serpentine staff of bone (2h)
data: It has weak weapon class for its type (little in general).
It decreases the users strength pitifully.
It decreases the users constitution adequately.
It increases the users intelligence a good amount.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than avarage.
This staff is occasionally able to 'drain' a magical field.
All the leeched power can then be 'salvaged' to replenish one's own
magical power, or it can also be 'discharged' at someone in a burst
